title: No capsule
body:
Hello guys

I juste recently passed from level 35 to 36 and I had no capsule at all....

Does anyone had the same experience ?

Thank you

replies.body: Another capsule lost at sea, oh wait, what's that glint? Find out next time on "Check your loot again for that missing capsule!"
no capsule, lvling from 38-39. sucks, that s all i was waiting for.
I just got the same thing
This just happened to me from 27 to 28 about an hour ago
I think this just happened to me.  I leveled up from 42 to 43.
